text: DPU may refer to: == Universities == * Dalian Polytechnic University, in Liaoning, China * Danube Private University, in Krems an der Donau, Austria * Dhurakij Pundit University, in Bangkok, Thailand * Dumlupınar University, in Turkey * DePaul University, in Chicago, Illinois ==Other uses== * Data processing unit * Delayed pressure urticaria * Depleted uranium * Dinosaur Pile-Up, an English alternative rock band * 1,3-Diphenylurea, a type of plant hormone * Distributed Power Unit, in rail transport * Massachusetts Department of Public Utilities * Delivered at Place Unloaded, an international trade term
title: DPU
